abstract: Cars at the Saab plant in Trollhattan started rolling off the assembly line again Friday as the head of the company’s prospective Chinese partner, Pang Da Automobile, paid a visit to the factory.
snippet: Cars at the Saab plant in Trollhattan started rolling off the assembly line again Friday as the head of the company’s prospective Chinese partner, Pang Da Automobile, paid a visit to the factory.
lead_paragraph: Cars at the Saab plant in Trollhattan started rolling off the assembly line again Friday as the head of the company’s prospective Chinese partner, Pang Da Automobile’s chief executive, Pang Qinghua, paid a visit to the factory.

headline.main: With Chinese Cash, Saab Starts Rolling Again
